name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
description: Epic trackless dark ride where you join the Resistance against the First Order
bestTime: Rope drop or last hour of park operation

name: The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror
description: Haunted elevator drop ride through a mysterious Hollywood hotel

name: Rock 'n' Roller Coaster Starring Aerosmith
description: High-speed indoor launch coaster with Aerosmith soundtrack

name: Slinky Dog Dash
description: Family coaster through Andy's backyard in Toy Story Land

name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
description: Pilot the Millennium Falcon on a smuggling mission with crew positions

name: Mickey & Minnie's Runaway Railway
description: Trackless 2.5D adventure through a zany cartoon world

name: Toy Story Midway Mania!
description: 4D interactive shooting game with Toy Story characters

name: Star Tours - The Adventures Continue
description: 3D motion simulator through the Star Wars galaxy with random destinations

name: Alien Swirling Saucers
description: Spinning alien toy saucers in Toy Story Land

name: Fantasmic!
description: Nighttime spectacular featuring Mickey's dreams and Disney villains

name: Beauty and the Beast - Live on Stage
description: Broadway-style live stage show of Beauty and the Beast

name: Indiana Jones Epic Stunt Spectacular!
description: Live-action stunt show featuring scenes from Indiana Jones

name: For the First Time in Forever: A Frozen Sing-Along Celebration
description: Interactive sing-along retelling of Frozen with royal historians

name: Disney Junior Dance Party!
description: Interactive dance party with Disney Junior characters

name: The Little Mermaid – A Musical Adventure
description: Musical retelling of The Little Mermaid story

name: Star Wars Launch Bay
description: Star Wars exhibits, props, and character meet-and-greets

name: Walt Disney Presents
description: Walk-through exhibit showcasing Walt Disney's life and legacy

name: Explore Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge
description: Immersive Star Wars land set on the planet Batuu

name: Build a Lightsaber at Savi's Workshop
description: Build your own custom lightsaber (additional cost)

name: Build a Droid at Droid Depot
description: Build your own interactive R2 or BB unit droid (additional cost)

name: Oga's Cantina
description: Star Wars themed bar with exotic drinks and DJ R-3X

name: Meet Star Wars Characters
description: Meet Kylo Ren, Chewbacca, Rey, and other Star Wars characters

name: Meet Toy Story Characters
description: Meet Woody, Buzz, and friends in Toy Story Land

name: Meet The Incredibles
description: Meet Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl, and Edna Mode

name: Woody's Lunch Box
description: Quick service with totchos and grilled cheese in Toy Story Land

name: Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo
description: Star Wars themed quick service with unique galactic cuisine

name: Blue Milk or Green Milk
description: Iconic frozen Star Wars milk drinks at Milk Stand

name: Ronto Roasters
description: Ronto wraps cooked by a podracer engine in Galaxy's Edge

name: Hollywood & Vine
description: Character dining buffet with Disney Junior or Minnie's Seasonal Dining

name: 50's Prime Time Café
description: Retro 1950s themed restaurant where servers act like family

name: Walk down Hollywood Boulevard
description: Stroll down the iconic 1930s-era Hollywood Boulevard

name: Explore Sunset Boulevard
description: Walk through the themed Sunset Boulevard area to Tower of Terror
